title: EOD Update
text:
EOD 13 Feb:
• Raised Issues on Metabase Manager repo to make ease of navigation and documentation changes.

title: EOD Update
text:
EOD 15 Feb
Attempted to implement sort feature for Status in Metabase Manager
(from issue https://github.com/ohcnetwork/metabase_manager/issues/9)

title: EOD Update
text:
EOD Feb 19
Added collapsible sections for cards grouped by sub-collections for Metabase Manager

title: EOD Update
text:
EOD 20 Feb :
Set up a record of all the variables available in CARE for ICMR proposal

EOD 21 Feb :
Set up a metabase query to get daily reports on patients registered and consultations filed in Karnataka

title: EOD Update
text:
EOD 27 Feb:
Consolidated all features from Issue 9 (https://github.com/ohcnetwork/metabase_manager/issues/9) and set up a pull request for the same.

title: EOD Update
text:
EOD Feb 28:
Attempted to consolidate the sorting function for the status column for metabase manager.
EOD Feb 29:
Completed integrating the feature into the main branch. Have updated the pull request to inform the same.
Updated a Care Providers Metric query in metabase across all instances.

title: EOD Update
text:
EOD March 1:
• Started working on introducing a log for the synchronization process on metabase manager in accordance with Issue 8
• Over the weekend, changed the logo size for 10BedIcu on dashboard across all instances.
• Attempted to solve change requests for dashboard EOD March 4
• Continued working on the log for metabase manager synchronization.
• Addressed the issues in the change requests for the dashboard.

title: EOD Update
text:
EOD 14 Mar
• Added more metadata to the sync log for metabase manager (Issue 8)
• Created a schema for a sync log table and added helper functions to interact with the database.

title: EOD Update
text:
EOD for 8th May, 20225
• Got on call with Vysakh and Aakash about blocks in ETL pipeline. Figured out an alternative approach for the same - using spec sheets in the resources directory for setting up flattening sql queries.
• Working on setting up a queryable view for using the date filter on the dashboard.
